mil.emp3.api.interfaces

Interface IContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGeoBase, IGeoContainer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IFeature<T>, IGeoJSON, IKML, IMap, IOverlay
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AirControlMeasure, Circle, Container, Ellipse, Feature, GeoJSON, KML, Map, MilStdSymbol, Overlay, Path, Point, Polygon, Rectangle, Square, Text

    public interface IContainer
extends IGeoContainer
    Container class serves as a base class for the Map objects including Map, Overlay and Feature. It implements some basic capabilities related to children, listeners and properties. A note on memory management: When an application passes a reference to a Container to the EMP via any of interface methods, the EMP Core doesn't clone the object, it uses and stores the reference to the object in its internal structures. Applications need to be careful when making changes to these objects. In many cases 'apply' methods are provided in the interface to allow the applications to control when a change is reflected on the map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventListenerHandle addContainerEventListener(IContainerEventListener listener)
      Adds a Container event listener, which will be invoked by the EMP Core when changes are made to the container, CameraEvent and ContainerEventEnum
      EventListenerHandle addFeatureEditEventListener(IFeatureEditEventListener listener)
      Adds a listener which will be invoked by the EMP Core as state of the feature in edit mode is changed as a result user actions on the screen, FeatureEditEvent and FeatureEditEventEnum
      EventListenerHandle addFeatureEventListener(IFeatureEventListener listener)
      Adds a listener which will be invoked by the EMP Core when a Feature on the Map is selected or de-selected using the IMap methods, FeatureEvent and FeatureEventEnum
      EventListenerHandle addFeatureInteractionEventListener(IFeatureInteractionEventListener listener)
      Adds a listener which will be invoked by the EMP Core when user interacts with a Feature icon on the screen using various supported gestures like tap, double tap, long press etc, FeatureUserInteractionEvent and UserInteractionEventEnum
      EventListenerHandle addVisibilityEventListener(IVisibilityEventListener listener)
      Adds a Visibility Event listener which will be invoked by the EMP Core when changes to visibility attribute of the Container are made, VisibilityEvent and VisibilityStateEnum

      This method removes all children from this container.

                                       throws EMP_Exception
        Adds a Container event listener, which will be invoked by the EMP Core when changes are made to the container, CameraEvent and ContainerEventEnum
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        EventListenerHandle A handle to the registration which is needed to unregister the listener.

        EMP_Exception

        Throws:
        EMP_Exception

      • removeEventListener

        void removeEventListener(EventListenerHandle hListener)
        This method removes the listener registration identified by the handle specified. The handle returned by the registration must be used to remove the registration to stop receiving events. all listeners must be removed before discarding the container.
        Parameters:
        hListener - The handle to the registration to remove.

        Returns:
